def update_vowel_file\(filepath, vowel_changes\):
    with open\(filepath, 'r', encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
        content = f.read\(\)
    
    for vowel, params in vowel_changes.items\(\):
        for param, new_val in params.items\(\):
            # Match the parameter line within the vowel's dict block
            # Format: 'param': value,  or 'param': value,  # comment
            if isinstance\(new_val, float\):
                val_str = str\(new_val\)
            else:
                val_str = str\(new_val\)
            
            # Find the vowel block and update the parameter within it
            # We need to find the vowel key and then the param within that block
            vowel_pattern = f"'{vowel}'"
            vowel_pos = content.find\(vowel_pattern + ': {'\)
            if vowel_pos == -1:
                vowel_pos = content.find\(vowel_pattern + ":"\)
            if vowel_pos == -1:
                print\(f"WARNING: Could not find vowel {vowel} in {filepath}"\)
                continue
            
            # Find the end of this vowel's dict \(next vowel or end of dict\)
            block_end = content.find\("\\n\\t'", vowel_pos + 1\)
            if block_end == -1:
                block_end = content.find\("\\n}", vowel_pos + 1\)
            if block_end == -1:
                block_end = len\(content\)
            
            block = content[vowel_pos:block_end]
            
            # Find the parameter line in this block
            param_pattern = f"'{param}'"
            param_pos_in_block = block.find\(param_pattern\)
            
            if param_pos_in_block == -1:
                # Parameter doesn't exist yet - need to add it
                # For voiceTurbulenceAmplitude, add after fricationAmplitude line
                if param == 'voiceTurbulenceAmplitude':
                    insert_after = "'fricationAmplitude': 0,"
                    insert_pos = block.find\(insert_after\)
                    if insert_pos != -1:
                        insert_pos += len\(insert_after\)
                        # Determine the comment based on vowel type
                        comment = ""
                        if new_val == 0.01:
                            comment = "  # Close vowel \\u2014 minimal HF fill"
                        elif new_val == 0.02:
                            comment = "  # Close-mid vowel \\u2014 light HF fill"
                        elif new_val == 0.03:
                            comment = "  # Open-mid vowel \\u2014 moderate HF fill"
                        elif new_val == 0.04:
                            comment = "  # Open vowel \\u2014 strongest HF fill"
                        new_line = f"\\n\\t\\t'voiceTurbulenceAmplitude': {val_str},{comment}"
                        new_block = block[:insert_pos] + new_line + block[insert_pos:]
                        content = content[:vowel_pos] + new_block + content[block_end:]
                        # Recalculate block_end since content changed
                        block_end += len\(new_line\)
                        block = content[vowel_pos:block_end]
                    else:
                        print\(f"WARNING: Could not find insertion point for {param} in {vowel}"\)
                continue
            
            # Find the full line with the parameter
            line_start = block.rfind\('\\n', 0, param_pos_in_block\)
            if line_start == -1:
                line_start = 0
            else:
                line_start += 1
            line_end = block.find\('\\n', param_pos_in_block\)
            if line_end == -1:
                line_end = len\(block\)
            
            old_line = block[line_start:line_end]
            
            # Parse the old line to get comment
            # Extract the value part and optional comment
            colon_pos = old_line.find\(':'\)
            if colon_pos == -1:
                continue
            
            after_colon = old_line[colon_pos+1:].strip\(\)
            # Split value and comment
            comma_pos = after_colon.find\(','\)
            if comma_pos == -1:
                continue
            
            old_value_str = after_colon[:comma_pos].strip\(\)
            after_comma = after_colon[comma_pos+1:]
            
            # Build the new line
            indent = old_line[:len\(old_line\) - len\(old_line.lstrip\(\)\)]
            
            # Generate appropriate comment
            comment = after_comma.strip\(\)
            if param == 'spectralTilt':
                if new_val == 2:
                    comment = "# Close-mid \\u2014 cutoff ~6540 Hz"
                elif new_val == 3:
                    comment = f"# Cutoff ~4675 Hz \(was {old_value_str}\)"
            elif param == 'lfRd':
                if new_val == 2.0:
                    comment = "# More modal voice for open vowel HF presence \(was 2.7\)"
                elif new_val == 2.2:
                    comment = "# Semi-open \\u2014 less breathy for HF presence \(was 2.7\)"
                elif new_val == 2.3:
                    comment = "# Open-mid \\u2014 slightly less breathy \(was 2.7\)"
            elif param == 'deltaB1':
                comment = f"# Scaled \\u00d70.80 \(was {old_value_str}\)"
            elif param in \('cb4', 'cb5', 'cb6'\):
                comment = f"# Q=4.0 \(was {old_value_str}\)"
            elif param in \('pb4', 'pb5', 'pb6'\):
                comment = f"# Match {param.replace\('p', 'c'\)}"
            
            if comment and not comment.startswith\('#'\):
                comment = '# ' + comment
            
            new_line = f"{indent}'{param}': {val_str},"
            if comment:
                # Pad to align comments
                new_line += f"  {comment}"
            
            new_block = block[:line_start] + new_line + block[line_end:]
            content = content[:vowel_pos] + new_block + content[block_end:]
            
            # Recalculate for next iteration
            diff = len\(new_block\) - len\(block\)
            block_end += diff
            block = content[vowel_pos:block_end]
    
    with open\(filepath, 'w', encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
        f.write\(content\)
    print\(f"Updated {filepath}"\)

# Group changes by file
front_vowels = {k: v for k, v in changes.items\(\) if k in '\\u026a\\u025b\\u00e6y\\u028f\\u00f8\\u0153\\u0276'}
back_vowels = {k: v for k, v in changes.items\(\) if k in 'u\\u028ao\\u0254\\u0251\\u0252\\u026f\\u0264\\u028c'}
central_vowels = {k: v for k, v in changes.items\(\) if k in '\\u0259\\u025c\\u025e\\u0250\\u0268\\u0289\\u0258\\u0275'}
rcolored_vowels = {k: v for k, v in changes.items\(\) if k in '\\u025d\\u025a'}

update_vowel_file\(r'C:\\git\\NVSpeechPlayer\\data\\vowels_front.py', front_vowels\)
update_vowel_file\(r'C:\\git\\NVSpeechPlayer\\data\\vowels_back.py', back_vowels\)
update_vowel_file\(r'C:\\git\\NVSpeechPlayer\\data\\vowels_central.py', central_vowels\)
update_vowel_file\(r'C:\\git\\NVSpeechPlayer\\data\\vowels_rcolored.py', rcolored_vowels\)

print\("All vowel files updated successfully!"\)
SCRIPT_EOF)

Bash("C:\\git\\NVSpeechPlayer\\tmp_update_vowels.py" << 'PYEOF'
import re

# Define pa4/pa5/pa6/parallelVoiceMix per vowel
vowel_params = {
    # Open vowels
    'a': {'pa4': 0.15, 'pa5': 0.10, 'pa6': 0.05, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.15},
    '\\u0251': {'pa4': 0.15, 'pa5': 0.10, 'pa6': 0.05, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.15},
    '\\u0252': {'pa4': 0.15, 'pa5': 0.10, 'pa6': 0.05, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.15},
    '\\u0276': {'pa4': 0.15, 'pa5': 0.10, 'pa6': 0.05, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.15},
    '\\u00e6': {'pa4': 0.15, 'pa5': 0.10, 'pa6': 0.05, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.15},
    '\\u0250': {'pa4': 0.15, 'pa5': 0.10, 'pa6': 0.05, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.15},
    # Open-mid vowels
    '\\u025b': {'pa4': 0.10, 'pa5': 0.08, 'pa6': 0.04, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.10},
    '\\u0254': {'pa4': 0.10, 'pa5': 0.08, 'pa6': 0.04, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.10},
    '\\u0153': {'pa4': 0.10, 'pa5': 0.08, 'pa6': 0.04, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.10},
    '\\u028c': {'pa4': 0.10, 'pa5': 0.08, 'pa6': 0.04, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.10},
    '\\u025c': {'pa4': 0.10, 'pa5': 0.08, 'pa6': 0.04, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.10},
    '\\u025e': {'pa4': 0.10, 'pa5': 0.08, 'pa6': 0.04, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.10},
    # Close-mid vowels
    'e': {'pa4': 0.05, 'pa5': 0.04, 'pa6': 0.02, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.05},
    'o': {'pa4': 0.05, 'pa5': 0.04, 'pa6': 0.02, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.05},
    '\\u00f8': {'pa4': 0.05, 'pa5': 0.04, 'pa6': 0.02, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.05},
    '\\u0258': {'pa4': 0.05, 'pa5': 0.04, 'pa6': 0.02, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.05},
    '\\u0275': {'pa4': 0.05, 'pa5': 0.04, 'pa6': 0.02, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.05},
    '\\u0264': {'pa4': 0.05, 'pa5': 0.04, 'pa6': 0.02, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.05},
    '\\u0259': {'pa4': 0.05, 'pa5': 0.04, 'pa6': 0.02, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.05},
    # Close vowels
    'i': {'pa4': 0, 'pa5': 0, 'pa6': 0, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0},
    'u': {'pa4': 0, 'pa5': 0, 'pa6': 0, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0},
    'y': {'pa4': 0, 'pa5': 0, 'pa6': 0, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0},
    '\\u026f': {'pa4': 0, 'pa5': 0, 'pa6': 0, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0},
    '\\u0268': {'pa4': 0, 'pa5': 0, 'pa6': 0, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0},
    '\\u0289': {'pa4': 0, 'pa5': 0, 'pa6': 0, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0},
    '\\u026a': {'pa4': 0, 'pa5': 0, 'pa6': 0, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0},
    '\\u028a': {'pa4': 0, 'pa5': 0, 'pa6': 0, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0},
    '\\u028f': {'pa4': 0, 'pa5': 0, 'pa6': 0, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0},
    # R-colored
    '\\u025d': {'pa4': 0.10, 'pa5': 0.08, 'pa6': 0.04, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.10},
    '\\u025a': {'pa4': 0.10, 'pa5': 0.08, 'pa6': 0.04, 'parallelVoiceMix': 0.10},
}

def update_file\(filepath, vowels_in_file\):
    with open\(filepath, 'r', encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
        content = f.read\(\)
    
    for vowel in vowels_in_file:
        if vowel not in vowel_params:
            print\(f"WARNING: No params defined for vowel {vowel}"\)
            continue
        params = vowel_params[vowel]
        
        # Find the vowel's block
        vowel_key = f"'{vowel}'"
        search_start = 0
        vowel_pos = content.find\(f"{vowel_key}: {{", search_start\)
        if vowel_pos == -1:
            vowel_pos = content.find\(f"\\t{vowel_key}:", search_start\)
        if vowel_pos == -1:
            print\(f"WARNING: Could not find vowel {vowel} in {filepath}"\)
            continue
        
        # Find the end of this vowel's dict
        brace_depth = 0
        block_start = content.find\('{', vowel_pos\)
        pos = block_start
        while pos < len\(content\):
            if content[pos] == '{':
                brace_depth += 1
            elif content[pos] == '}':
                brace_depth -= 1
                if brace_depth == 0:
                    block_end = pos + 1
                    break
            pos += 1
        else:
            print\(f"WARNING: Could not find end of block for {vowel}"\)
            continue
        
        block = content[vowel_pos:block_end]
        
        # Update pa4, pa5, pa6
        for param in ['pa4', 'pa5', 'pa6']:
            val = params[param]
            if val == 0:
                val_str = '0'
            else:
                val_str = str\(val\)
            
            old_pattern = f"'{param}': 0,"
            new_text = f"'{param}': {val_str},"
            if old_pattern in block:
                block = block.replace\(old_pattern, new_text, 1\)
        
        # Add parallelVoiceMix after parallelBypass line
        pvm_val = params['parallelVoiceMix']
        if pvm_val == 0:
            pvm_str = '0'
        else:
            pvm_str = str\(pvm_val\)
        
        if "'parallelVoiceMix'" not in block:
            pb_pattern = "'parallelBypass': 0,"
            pb_pos = block.find\(pb_pattern\)
            if pb_pos != -1:
                line_end = block.find\('\\n', pb_pos\)
                if line_end != -1:
                    insert_text = f"\\n\\t\\t'parallelVoiceMix': {pvm_str},"
                    block = block[:line_end] + insert_text + block[line_end:]
                else:
                    print\(f"WARNING: Could not find line end after parallelBypass for {vowel}"\)
            else:
                print\(f"WARNING: Could not find parallelBypass for {vowel}"\)
        
        content = content[:vowel_pos] + block + content[block_end:]
    
    with open\(filepath, 'w', encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
        f.write\(content\)
    print\(f"Updated {filepath}"\)

front_vowels = ['a', 'i', 'e', '\\u026a', '\\u025b', '\\u00e6', 'y', '\\u028f', '\\u00f8', '\\u0153', '\\u0276']
back_vowels = ['u', '\\u028a', 'o', '\\u0254', '\\u0251', '\\u0252', '\\u026f', '\\u0264', '\\u028c']
central_vowels = ['\\u0259', '\\u025c', '\\u025e', '\\u0250', '\\u0268', '\\u0289', '\\u0258', '\\u0275']
rcolored_vowels = ['\\u025d', '\\u025a']

update_file\(r'C:\\git\\NVSpeechPlayer\\data\\vowels_front.py', front_vowels\)
update_file\(r'C:\\git\\NVSpeechPlayer\\data\\vowels_back.py', back_vowels\)
update_file\(r'C:\\git\\NVSpeechPlayer\\data\\vowels_central.py', central_vowels\)
update_file\(r'C:\\git\\NVSpeechPlayer\\data\\vowels_rcolored.py', rcolored_vowels\)

print\("\\nAll done! parallelVoiceMix and pa4-pa6 updated for all vowels."\)
PYEOF)
